section.name: PHYS MODELS OF BIO SYSTE: Physical Models of Biological Systems

comments: Students were incredibly positive about Professor Nelson: “Never have I had a professor so committed to his students or so capable of getting students excited about the subject matter” one student said. However, students strongly disapproved of the exam structure, which mostly tested minutiae not covered or not emphasized in class. Students also did not like the emphasis on Matlab, the programming component of the course. Material was described as “unique and useful for any nascent scientist.”
